page.title: 10D.E.O.D.S. & E.O.D.T.I.C.
page.content: under water bomb disposal techniques. Attached to the school is a museum which houses many examples of explosive weaponary used over the last century the pride of which is a German V2 rocket. Explosive Ordnance Disposal Technical Imformation Centre The purpose of EODTIC is to provide facilities for the exchange of Explosive Ordnance Reconnaissance and Explosive Ordnance Disposal Imformation. It was established by NATO under the custodianship of the UK. Ten nations participate in the project. It has a staff of three. Both the Custodian and the Professional and Technical Officer are ex-service EOD men with many years of practical experience in the field. The centre has a library of some 2900 books and manuals some of which date
